description: A React functional component that provides an input field and button for adding new todo items, managing local input state and handling user interactions.

methods.name: TodoInput
methods.description: React component allowing users to input new todo items and trigger addition via callback.

methods.name: handleAdd
methods.description: Handles adding a new todo by trimming input, invoking onAdd callback, and resetting input field.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key press events in input, triggering add if Enter key is pressed.
